channel.title: What do i do when i enter my default Gateway into Search bar!?
channel.description:
i have set enviromental variables! and i have put my defaullt gateway into Search bar What do i click on when im on the site?? please help i would Rep++ if i could ! PLEASE I REALLY NEED BIG HELP!!
i clicked'FIREWALL' and is says your Router is equipped with a firewall that will protect your network from a wide array of common hacker attacks including Ping of Death (PoD) and Denial of Service (DoS) attacks. You can turn the firewall function off if needed. Turning off the firewall protection will not leave your network completely vulnerable to hacker attacks, but it is recommended that you turn the firewall on whenever possible.
So do i disable it so people can connect? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2009, 02:25:10 pm[/size][hr]I clicked 'FIREWALL' like it said in tut and its says, your Router is equipped with a firewall that will protect your network from a wide array of common hacker attacks including Ping of Death (PoD) and Denial of Service (DoS) attacks. You can turn the firewall function off if needed. Turning off the firewall protection will not leave your network completely vulnerable to hacker attacks, but it is recommended that you turn the firewall on whenever possible.
And then it has an option Disable or enable do i Disable it for people to connect!?

item.title: What do i do when i enter my default Gateway into Search bar!?
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

in your firewall you can add ports that let people get through with that port (43594) if you do that it should work but im not 100% on this

Read full topic
item.source: What do i do when i enter my default Gateway into Search bar!?

item.title: What do i do when i enter my default Gateway into Search bar!?
item.dc:creator: @runescapemod runescapemod
item.description:
@runescapemod wrote:

i have set enviromental variables! and i have put my defaullt gateway into Search bar What do i click on when im on the site?? please help i would Rep++ if i could ! PLEASE I REALLY NEED BIG HELP!!

i clicked’FIREWALL’ and is says your Router is equipped with a firewall that will protect your network from a wide array of common hacker attacks including Ping of Death (PoD) and Denial of Service (DoS) attacks. You can turn the firewall function off if needed. Turning off the firewall protection will not leave your network completely vulnerable to hacker attacks, but it is recommended that you turn the firewall on whenever possible.

So do i disable it so people can connect?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2009, 02:25:10 pm[/size][hr]I clicked ‘FIREWALL’ like it said in tut and its says, your Router is equipped with a firewall that will protect your network from a wide array of common hacker attacks including Ping of Death (PoD) and Denial of Service (DoS) attacks. You can turn the firewall function off if needed. Turning off the firewall protection will not leave your network completely vulnerable to hacker attacks, but it is recommended that you turn the firewall on whenever possible.

And then it has an option Disable or enable do i Disable it for people to connect!?
